abilities.desc: You have Armor against damage from Burning tokens.
After you Reduce a Hit, give 1 Burning token to your attacker.

actions.name: Flame Guard
actions.desc:
You can only use Flame Guard while you hold no Iron tokens.
You gain 2 Iron tokens.
Usable once per turn.

actions.name: Heat Beam
actions.desc:
Unblockable.
Deal 3 damage to an enemy you can see that is holding at least 2 Burning tokens, then they discard 2 Burning tokens.
